cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to a negative value of -1 will cause the gNB to fail during initialization as the thread count must be positive.

du.explanation_en: Setting the downlink carrier bandwidth to an out-of-range value of 1000 PRBs will cause the gNB to fail during initialization as the value exceeds the maximum allowed bandwidth.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行載波帶寬設定為超出範圍的值 1000 PRB 會導致 gNB 在初始化期間失敗，因為該值超過允許的最大帶寬。
